Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

14 #include "KRandom.h"
15 using katrin::KRandom;

17 namespace Kassiopeia
18 {
19  KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom():
20  fTotalArea( 0. )
21  {}
22  KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom(const KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom& aCopy):
23  KSComponent(),
24  fTotalArea( aCopy.fTotalArea ),
25  fElementsystems( aCopy.fElementsystems )
26  {}

28  KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom* KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::Clone() const
29  {
30  return new KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom(*this);
31  }
32 
33  KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::~KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom() {}
34 
35  void KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::VisitSurface( KGeoBag::KGSurface* aSurface )
36  {
37  struct KSGenCoordinatesystem tCoordinateSystem = { aSurface->GetOrigin(),
38  aSurface->GetXAxis(),
39  aSurface->GetYAxis(),
40  aSurface->GetZAxis() };
41  KSGenMeshElementSystem tSystem;
42  tSystem.first = tCoordinateSystem;
43  tSystem.second = NULL;
44 
45  fElementsystems.push_back( tSystem );
46 
47  return;
48  }
49 
50  void KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::VisitExtendedSurface( KGeoBag::KGExtendedSurface< KGeoBag::KGMesh >* anExtendedSurface )
51  {
52  fElementsystems.back().second = anExtendedSurface->Elements();
53 
54  return;
55  }
56 
57  void KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::Dice(KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries)
58  {
59  for(KSParticleIt tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); ++tParticleIt)
60  {
61  double tDecision = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() * fTotalArea;
62  std::vector< KSGenMeshElementSystem >::iterator tSysIt;
63  KGeoBag::KGMeshElementCIt tElementIt;
64 
65  for( tSysIt = fElementsystems.begin(); tSysIt != fElementsystems.end(); ++tSysIt )
66  {
67  for( tElementIt = tSysIt->second->begin(); tElementIt != tSysIt->second->end(); ++tElementIt )
68  {
69  tDecision -= (*tElementIt)->Area();
70  if (tDecision < 0.)
71  {
72  break;
73  }
74  }
75 
76  if( tDecision < 0.)
77  break;
78  }
79 
80  if( KGeoBag::KGMeshRectangle* tMeshRectangle = dynamic_cast< KGeoBag::KGMeshRectangle* >( *tElementIt ) )
81  {
82  KThreeVector tInternalRandomPosition = tMeshRectangle->GetP0() + KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() * tMeshRectangle->GetA() * tMeshRectangle->GetN1()
83  + KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() * tMeshRectangle->GetB() * tMeshRectangle->GetN2();
84 
85  KThreeVector tExternalRandomPosition = tSysIt->first.fOrigin + tInternalRandomPosition.X() * tSysIt->first.fXAxis
86  + tInternalRandomPosition.Y() * tSysIt->first.fYAxis
87  + tInternalRandomPosition.Z() * tSysIt->first.fZAxis;
88 
89  (*tParticleIt)->SetPosition(tExternalRandomPosition);
90  genmsg( eDebug ) << "surface random position generator <" << GetName() << "> diced position " << tExternalRandomPosition << " on rectangle" << eom;
91  continue;
92  }
93 
94  if( KGeoBag::KGMeshTriangle* tMeshTriangle = dynamic_cast< KGeoBag::KGMeshTriangle* >( *tElementIt ) )
95  {
96  //P = (1 - sqrt(r1)) * A + (sqrt(r1) * (1 - r2)) * B + (sqrt(r1) * r2) * C
97  double r1 = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
98  double r2 = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
99 
100  KThreeVector tInternalRandomPosition = (1 - sqrt(r1)) * tMeshTriangle->GetP0()
101  + (sqrt(r1) * (1 - r2)) * tMeshTriangle->GetP1()
102  + (sqrt(r1) * r2) * tMeshTriangle->GetP2();
103 
104  KThreeVector tExternalRandomPosition = tSysIt->first.fOrigin + tInternalRandomPosition.X() * tSysIt->first.fXAxis
105  + tInternalRandomPosition.Y() * tSysIt->first.fYAxis
106  + tInternalRandomPosition.Z() * tSysIt->first.fZAxis;
107 
108  (*tParticleIt)->SetPosition(tExternalRandomPosition);
109  genmsg( eDebug ) << "surface random position generator <" << GetName() << "> diced position " << tExternalRandomPosition << " on triangle" << eom;
110  continue;
111 
112  }
113 
114  if( KGeoBag::KGMeshWire* tMeshWire = dynamic_cast< KGeoBag::KGMeshWire* >( *tElementIt ) )
115  {
116  KThreeVector tStart = tMeshWire->GetP1();
117  KThreeVector tEnd = tMeshWire->GetP0();
118  KThreeVector tConnection = tEnd - tStart;
119  KThreeVector tOrthogonal = tConnection.Orthogonal();
120  KThreeVector tU = tOrthogonal.Unit();
121  KThreeVector tV = tConnection.Cross( tOrthogonal ).Unit();
122 
123  double tRadius = tMeshWire->GetDiameter() / 2.;
124  double tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform()*360.;
125 
126  KThreeVector tInternalRandomPosition = tStart + KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() * tConnection
127  + tRadius * (cos( tPhi ) * tU + sin( tPhi ) * tV);
128 
129  KThreeVector tExternalRandomPosition = tSysIt->first.fOrigin + tInternalRandomPosition.X() * tSysIt->first.fXAxis
130  + tInternalRandomPosition.Y() * tSysIt->first.fYAxis
131  + tInternalRandomPosition.Z() * tSysIt->first.fZAxis;
132 
133  (*tParticleIt)->SetPosition(tExternalRandomPosition);
134  genmsg( eDebug ) << "surface random position generator <" << GetName() << "> diced position " << tExternalRandomPosition << " on wire" << eom;
135  continue;
136  }
137  genmsg( eError ) << "Could not dice a position! Only rectangles, triangles and wires are acceptable elements. " << eom;
138  }
139  }
140 
141  void KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::InitializeComponent()
142  {
143 
144  for( std::vector< KSGenMeshElementSystem >::iterator tSysIt = fElementsystems.begin();
145  tSysIt != fElementsystems.end();
146  ++tSysIt )
147  {
148  for( KGeoBag::KGMeshElementCIt tElementIt = tSysIt->second->begin();
149  tElementIt != tSysIt->second->end();
150  ++tElementIt )
151  {
152  fTotalArea += (*tElementIt)->Area();
153  }
154  }
155 
156  if( fTotalArea <= 0. || fTotalArea != fTotalArea )
157  genmsg(eError) << "KSGenPositionRandomSurface fTotalArea is " << fTotalArea << " wrong/corrupt mesh?" << eom;
158 
159  genmsg( eDebug ) << "KSGenPositionRandomSurface fTotalArea: " << fTotalArea << eom;
160  return;
161  }
162  void KSGenPositionMeshSurfaceRandom::DeinitializeComponent()
163  {}
164 
165 }
